Actions.Text: REFERRED TO ALCOHOLISM AND DRUG ABUSE
REFERRED TO ALCOHOLISM AND DRUG ABUSE

Title: Establishes protocols for assisted outpatient treatment for substance abuse
Summary: Establishes protocols for assisted outpatient treatment for substance abuse; provides criteria for assisted outpatient treatment for substance abuse; provides for service, right to counsel, hearings, appeals and applications for additional periods of treatment; makes related changes.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the mental hygiene law, in relation to establishing protocols for assisted outpatient treatment for substance abuse
